column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////First impression it looks very very different compared to Giordiano's. The top layer of the pizza pie you have tomatoes
column3: and then the cheese is on the bottom protecting the crust. Let me tell you
column4: this place is freaking great and the ingredients they used made such a huge difference. You can actually taste the sweetness and the acidity of the tomatoes and its a nice balance with the savory sausage and the mozerella cheese. It's so simple but the individual ingredients are great and combined blends together really well.
